intros.list: Browse the list and open an item to see details or actions.
intros.sort: Reorder the list to match your preferred order.
intros.editor: Edit the content and use the action bar to apply or cancel.
intros.settings: Adjust the available settings for this area.
intros.info: Read the information and close the dialog when done.
intros.search: Search and select a result from the list.
intros.searchMap: Search and select results using the map.
intros.picker: Choose an item and confirm your selection.
intros.chat: Read the conversation and use actions to respond or manage messages.
intros.scan: Scan a code and follow the result.
intros.qr: Show or share this QR code.
intros.legal: Read the legal information and related links.
intros.report: Provide the details needed to submit a report.
intros.connect: Connect with a contact by scanning or sharing codes.
intros.tileEdit: Edit the tile content and appearance.

selection.title: Selection
selection.desc: Tap an entry to open details or choose it.

actions.title: Action bar
actions.desc: Use the action bar buttons to close, apply, or confirm.

cancel.title: Cancel
cancel.desc: Closes the dialog without saving changes.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: Closes the dialog and saves your changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens the help dialog.

sort.title: Sorting
sort.desc: Drag items to change their order.

filter.title: Filters
filter.desc: Show unread, read, or all items.

search.title: Search
search.desc: Enter a term to find results.

map.title: Map
map.desc: Move and zoom the map to explore.

content.title: Content
content.desc: Review and edit the content in this dialog.

media.title: Media
media.desc: Add or adjust images and other attachments.

chat.title: Conversation
chat.desc: Read messages and use actions to reply or manage them.

scan.title: Scanning
scan.desc: Point your camera at a code to scan it.

qr.title: QR code
qr.desc: Show this code to connect or share.

user.title: My account
user.intro: This screen manages your local account on this device: create backups, change your PIN, control security actions, and delete the account.

backup.title: Backup
backup.desc: Creates an encrypted backup of your local data. You choose the storage location and set a dedicated backup PIN.

changePin.title: Change PIN
changePin.desc: Sets a new PIN for this user on this device. The PIN protects local access to the account.

resetKeys.title: Reset security keys
resetKeys.desc: Generates new cryptographic keys for private communication. Existing private messages can no longer be decrypted afterwards.

delete.title: Delete user
delete.desc: Permanently removes this user including related data on this device and on the backend.

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes the dialog without taking further action.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Frontend: user data is stored locally in IndexedDB and additionally protected by PIN. Backend: only operational metadata is stored (for example user ID, public keys, status data). Private content is transferred end-to-end encrypted and stored encrypted wherever technically possible.

profile.title: My profile
profile.intro: This screen manages your profile on this device: choose or remove an avatar, adjust style, and save changes.

avatar.title: Select or edit avatar
avatar.desc: Opens avatar selection (file or Unsplash) or editing for an existing avatar.

avatarDelete.title: Remove avatar
avatarDelete.desc: Removes the currently selected avatar from your profile.

style.title: Change style
style.desc: Cycles the default style used for your own content.

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes the dialog and discards unsaved changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Profile name and avatar are stored locally. If you explicitly share your profile with contacts, shared profile data is transferred end-to-end encrypted.

systemMessages.title: System messages
systemMessages.intro: This component shows moderation and system notices. You can filter messages, open details, and manage entries directly.

filterRead.title: Filter: Read
filterRead.desc: Shows only messages already marked as read.

filterAll.title: Filter: All
filterAll.desc: Shows all system messages regardless of read state.

openDetails.title: Open message
openDetails.desc: Opens the detail view for the selected system message.

openCaseLink.title: Open case status
openCaseLink.desc: Opens the related case status link in your browser when available.

toggleRead.title: Toggle read state
toggleRead.desc: Marks the message as read or unread.

deleteAll.title: Delete all
deleteAll.desc: Removes all system messages currently shown in the list.

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes the system messages dialog.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: System messages contain moderation and status information. They are cached locally for display; private communication content is not exposed as plaintext here.

airQuality.title: Air quality
airQuality.intro: In this dialog you review air-quality data for a location and switch between tile and chart view.

day.title: Select day
day.desc: Use the day toggle bar to switch between available forecast days.

category.title: Switch category
category.desc: Use categories (pollen, particulate matter, pollutants) to filter visible metrics.

hour.title: Select hour
hour.desc: Use the hour slider to choose the time used for tile values.

tiles.title: Open metric tile
tiles.desc: Tap a tile to open the detailed view for that metric.

detail.title: View detail chart
detail.desc: The detail view shows the daily timeline of the selected metric as a chart.

navigation.title: Navigate metrics
navigation.desc: In detail view, use arrows to switch to previous or next metric and X to return to tile view.

source.title: Data source
source.desc: The link in the dialog shows the provider used for these values (Open-Meteo).

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes the air-quality dialog.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: For air-quality requests, location data is sent to the app server and weather provider. Loaded values are cached locally in app storage (IndexedDB).

weather.title: Weather
weather.intro: In this dialog you review weather data for a location and switch between tile and chart view.

day.title: Select day
day.desc: Use the day toggle bar to switch between available forecast days.

hour.title: Select hour
hour.desc: Use the hour slider to choose the time shown in weather tiles.

tiles.title: Open weather tile
tiles.desc: Tap a tile to open the detailed view for that metric.

detail.title: View detail chart
detail.desc: The detail view shows the daily timeline of the selected weather metric as a chart.

navigation.title: Navigate metrics
navigation.desc: In detail view, use arrows to switch to previous or next metric and X to return to tile view.

source.title: Data source
source.desc: The link in the dialog shows the provider used for these values (Open-Meteo).

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes the weather dialog.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: For weather requests, location data is sent to the app server and weather provider. Loaded values are cached locally in app storage (IndexedDB).

appMenu.title: MessageDrop help
appMenu.intro: MessageDrop is an app for sharing public messages, private chats, and location-based content such as weather and experiences.

overview.title: Core functionality
overview.desc: The map is the central view. Depending on map area, zoom, and search settings, matching content is loaded as pins. Menus are used to create, search, and manage data.

restricted.title: Login required
restricted.desc: Some features are only available after login. Depending on the action, a backend connection is also required; before that, certain items are locked or hidden.

userMenu.title: User menu
userMenu.desc: Use the person button to open the user menu.

logout.title: Logout
logout.desc: Signs out from the current user account.

connectBackend.title: Connect to backend
connectBackend.desc: Establishes backend access so server-based features are available (when offered).

myUser.title: My user
myUser.desc: Opens the user view with your account information.

myProfile.title: My profile
myProfile.desc: Opens your profile to adjust personal details.

systemMessages.title: System messages
systemMessages.desc: Shows important notices such as maintenance or procedure updates.

myPublicMessages.title: My public messages
myPublicMessages.desc: Opens the list of your public messages.

myPrivateNotes.title: My private notes
myPrivateNotes.desc: Opens the list of your private notes.

myContacts.title: My contacts
myContacts.desc: Opens your contacts and their chat entries.

appMenu.title: App menu
appMenu.desc: Use the apps button to open settings, legal texts, and restore options.

appSettings.title: App settings
appSettings.desc: Opens global settings such as theme, language, storage, and backup options.

searchSettings.title: Search settings
searchSettings.desc: Defines which data sources are visible on the map and the minimum zoom level to load them.

externalContent.title: External content
externalContent.desc: Enable or disable third-party content providers (for example YouTube or Spotify).

restore.title: Restore backup
restore.desc: Starts the restore flow to import an encrypted backup.

terms.title: Terms of service
terms.desc: Opens the current terms of service.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.desc: Opens the privacy policy with details about data processing.

licenses.title: Third-party licenses
licenses.desc: Shows open-source and third-party licenses used by the app.

menuHelp.title: Help
menuHelp.desc: Opens this help dialog for all menus in the app view.

mainMenu.title: Main menu
mainMenu.desc: Use the pin button to open the main menu for location-based actions.

locateMe.title: Locate me
locateMe.desc: Detects your current position and centers the map there.

publicMessage.title: Public message
publicMessage.desc: Creates a new public message at the current map point.

privateNote.title: Private note
privateNote.desc: Creates a private note at the current map point.

privateImage.title: Private image
privateImage.desc: Adds a private image at the current map point.

privateDocument.title: Private document
privateDocument.desc: Adds a private document at the current map point.

weather.title: Weather
weather.desc: Opens the weather dialog for the current map position.

airQuality.title: Air quality
airQuality.desc: Opens the air-quality dialog for the current map position.

searchMenu.title: Search menu
searchMenu.desc: Use the search button to open place, experience, and hashtag search.

searchPlace.title: Search place
searchPlace.desc: Starts place search and shows results in list or map view.

searchExperiences.title: Search experiences
searchExperiences.desc: Starts experience search and shows matching offers.

searchHashtags.title: Search hashtags
searchHashtags.desc: Searches one hashtag across public messages/comments and local places, contacts, and experiences.

zoom.title: Map zoom
zoom.desc: Use the +/- zoom buttons to zoom in or out. Higher zoom shows more detail and can load additional nearby results.

pins.title: Map pins
pins.desc: Different pin types represent different content (for example public messages, private notes/images/documents, experience destinations, and your own experiences). The multi pin marks multiple items at the same location.

privacy.title: Privacy first
privacy.desc: Privacy is especially important to us: data is processed locally and encrypted where possible. External transfers happen only when technically required or after your active choice.

appSettings.title: App settings
appSettings.intro: In this dialog you configure global app settings such as theme, language, storage, and backup options.

themeMode.title: Light/Dark/System
themeMode.desc: Controls whether the app uses light mode, dark mode, or the device theme.

language.title: Set language
language.desc: Selects the app language or system language.

location.title: Location on startup
location.desc: Enables location detection when the app starts (only available when location permission is granted).

storage.title: Request persistent storage
storage.desc: Requests persistent browser storage so local data is less likely to be cleared by the system.

usageProtection.title: Usage protection
usageProtection.desc: Configures daily limits, allowed time windows, and unlock mode (self or parental PIN).

logging.title: Diagnostic logging
logging.desc: Enables technical logs for analysis and troubleshooting.

backup.title: Backup on exit
backup.desc: Creates a local backup automatically when leaving the app.

version.title: Version info
version.desc: Shows installed version, build, commit, and timestamp.

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes the dialog and discards unapplied changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: These settings are stored locally in app storage (IndexedDB). External requests occur only when you actively use related features (for example location permission).

usageProtectionLock.title: Usage protection lock
usageProtectionLock.intro: This screen appears when the daily usage limit is reached or when the app is outside the configured usage window.

dailyLimit.title: Daily limit reached
dailyLimit.desc: The app is locked after the configured minutes are consumed for today.

schedule.title: Schedule lock
schedule.desc: The app can also lock outside the allowed weekday/weekend time windows.

selfExtension.title: Self extension
selfExtension.desc: In self-managed mode, one additional extension can be activated after the daily limit is reached.

parentPin.title: Unlock with parent PIN
parentPin.desc: In parental mode, only a valid parent PIN unlocks usage after the daily limit.

settings.title: Open app settings
settings.desc: Use this action to adjust usage protection settings.

help.title: Open help
help.desc: Opens this help view for usage protection.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Usage settings and counters are stored locally and can be synced with your user account if backend login is active.

myContactChatroom.title: Contact chatroom
myContactChatroom.intro: This chatroom lets you exchange private messages with one contact as text, media, voice note, experience, or location message.

profile.title: Open profiles and settings
profile.desc: This action opens your profile or the contact settings by tapping the avatar/title areas.

compose.title: Compose message
compose.desc: This action starts a new chat message.

experience.title: Add experience
experience.desc: This action adds an experience card from experience search to your message.

location.title: Send location message
location.desc: The location icon sends a dedicated location message. That message includes buttons to show it on the app map or open it in Google Maps.

audio.title: Record voice message
audio.desc: This action records and sends an audio message.

reaction.title: Set reaction
reaction.desc: This action opens emoji reactions for received messages.

translate.title: Translate message
translate.desc: This action translates incoming text and can switch back to the original.

map.title: Open map actions
map.desc: This action jumps to shared locations on the app map or opens external maps.

edit.title: Edit message
edit.desc: The pencil opens the edit dialog. Changes are sent as a new edited message; the original message remains.

delete.title: Delete message
delete.desc: Messages can be deleted via the trash icon. Your own sent messages are removed in both chats. Received messages are removed only in your chat; for the sender, the message remains and is marked as deleted.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the chatroom.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Contact messages are transmitted end-to-end encrypted and stored as encrypted payloads. The server keeps message content only temporarily and removes the payload after successful local storage on the recipient device. Local content is stored in protected local app storage (IndexedDB).

myContactConnectId.title: Connect with connect ID
myContactConnectId.intro: This dialog connects a contact by entering their connect ID.

id.title: Enter connect ID
id.desc: This action enters or edits the connect ID of the contact.

paste.title: Paste from clipboard
paste.desc: This action inserts a connect ID directly from your clipboard.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without connecting.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Connect
apply.desc: This action confirms the entered ID and starts the contact connection.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: The connect ID is transmitted to the backend to create a contact link. Only data required to establish the contact relationship is processed.

myContactSettings.title: My contact settings
myContactSettings.intro: This dialog edits one contact profile. You can change name, avatar, chat background, and transparency, then save the settings.

name.title: Edit contact name
name.desc: This action changes the display name of the selected contact.

avatar.title: Set or edit avatar
avatar.desc: This action sets a new avatar image or replaces the current avatar.

avatarRemove.title: Remove avatar
avatarRemove.desc: This action removes the current contact avatar.

background.title: Set or edit chat background
background.desc: This action sets or replaces the background image used in the contact chat.

backgroundRemove.title: Remove chat background
backgroundRemove.desc: This action removes the current chat background image.

transparency.title: Adjust background transparency
transparency.desc: This action changes the chat background transparency percentage.

syncProfile.title: Request profile update
syncProfile.desc: This action requests the current profile data from the contact when this option is available.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without applying changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: This action saves and applies your contact settings.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Contact profile settings are linked to your account. Images and metadata are processed for avatar and background features. Opening attribution links can send requests to external providers such as Unsplash.

myContactList.title: My contacts
myContactList.intro: This view manages your contacts. You can open contact settings, start chats, manage tiles, and use connection actions such as share ID or QR connect.

open.title: Open contact settings
open.desc: This action opens settings for the selected contact.

delete.title: Delete contact
delete.desc: This action permanently removes the selected contact.

chat.title: Open chat
chat.desc: This action opens the private chat with the selected contact.

tiles.title: Open tiles
tiles.desc: This action opens the tile list for the selected contact.

more.title: Open more actions
more.desc: This action opens the submenu with additional actions for the selected contact.

subscribe.title: Subscribe contact
subscribe.desc: This action enables notifications for the selected contact.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe contact
unsubscribe.desc: This action disables notifications for the selected contact.

sort.title: Sort contacts
sort.desc: This action opens the sorting dialog and changes your contact order.

add.title: Add or connect contact
add.desc: This action opens the connection menu (share ID, connect with ID, share QR, or scan QR).

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the contacts list.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Contact relations are linked to your account. Opening attribution links can send requests to external providers (for example Unsplash). Connection actions exchange contact IDs or QR data needed to create the contact link.

myContactSort.title: Sort my contacts
myContactSort.intro: This dialog changes the order of your contacts.

reorder.title: Reorder contacts
reorder.desc: This action changes the contact order using drag and drop.

settings.title: Open contact settings
settings.desc: This action opens settings for the selected contact directly from the sort list.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the sorting dialog without applying changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: This action saves and applies the new contact order.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: The contact order is stored with your contact data. Only data required for sorting and display is processed.

editMessage.title: Create or edit message
editMessage.intro: This form lets you create or edit a public message or a comment. You can adjust text, media, and for public messages the location before sending.

media.title: Select media
media.desc: This action adds media to the message or replaces existing media.

text.title: Edit message text
text.desc: This action opens the text dialog to write or update the message text.

style.title: Change text style
style.desc: This action applies a new style for how the message text is displayed.

location.title: Choose location
location.desc: This action selects the message location using the location picker. This option is only available for public messages.

hashtags.title: Manage hashtags
hashtags.desc: Public hashtags are moderated like message text (pattern detection and moderation checks).

remove.title: Remove content
remove.desc: This action removes current text or selected media from the message.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Send
apply.desc: This action sends the message or applies your edits.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Public messages are visible to others and are not stored with end-to-end encryption on the server. Public text is checked before publish and edit by automated pattern detection and moderation. Private chat messages are handled separately with encryption. Embedding external media can trigger requests to third-party providers; navigation only transfers position data.

editNote.title: Create or edit note
editNote.intro: This form lets you create or edit a private note for the current location. You can adjust text, media, and position before saving.

media.title: Select media
media.desc: This action adds media to the note or replaces existing media.

text.title: Edit note text
text.desc: This action opens the text dialog to write or update the note content.

style.title: Change text style
style.desc: This action applies a new style for how the note text is displayed.

location.title: Choose position
location.desc: This action selects the note position using the location picker.

remove.title: Remove content
remove.desc: This action removes current text or selected media from the note.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Save
apply.desc: This action saves the note and applies all changes.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Note content is stored locally in IndexedDB and always stored in encrypted form. The note feature does not store note content on the backend. External navigation only receives position data; embedding external media can create requests to third-party providers.

legalDisclaimer.intro: Here you read the disclaimer, switch language, and can open or download the text.

language.desc: Switches between German and English versions.

content.desc: Shows the full disclaimer in the dialog.

consent.title: Set consent
consent.desc: Use the toggle to confirm or revoke your consent.

retry.desc: Loads the text again if an error is shown.

open.desc: Opens the current legal text in a browser tab.

legalExternalContent.title: External content
legalExternalContent.intro: Here you control which external content is allowed to load in the app.

providers.title: Select providers
providers.desc: Each supported provider has its own settings tile (for example YouTube, Spotify, Tenor, Unsplash).

toggle.title: Allow or block content
toggle.desc: The toggle enables or disables content per provider.

links.title: Terms and privacy links
links.desc: For each provider, you can open linked terms and privacy notices directly.

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes the dialog without applying changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and external requests
privacy.desc: When providers are enabled, loading external content can send requests to third parties (for example IP address and browser data). Disabled providers are not embedded in the app.

open.desc: Opens the legal notice in a browser tab.

thirdPartyLicenses.intro: Here you can view license texts of third-party libraries used in the app and open or download them.

content.desc: Shows collected third-party licenses in the dialog.

retry.desc: Loads the license file again if an error is shown.

open.desc: Opens the license file in a browser tab.

myMessageList.title: My public messages
myMessageList.intro: This view manages your published posts and comments. You can edit, delete, review moderation details, and open DSA case information.

add.title: Create message or comment
add.desc: This action creates a new public post or a comment in the current thread.

comments.title: Open comments
comments.desc: This action opens the comment thread of a post.

like.title: Set like
like.desc: This action adds positive feedback (thumbs up) to a post or comment. Clicking again removes your reaction.

unlike.title: Set unlike
unlike.desc: This action adds negative feedback (thumbs down) to a post or comment. Clicking again removes your reaction.

edit.title: Edit post
edit.desc: This action edits your own post or comment.

delete.title: Delete post
delete.desc: This action deletes your post or comment manually and immediately.

moderation.title: View moderation status
moderation.desc: This action shows moderation status (published, review, hidden) including decision details.

retention.title: Automatic deletion rules
retention.desc: Public posts start with a 30-day lifetime. Expired entries are cleaned up automatically on the server at regular intervals.

dsa.title: DSA case status
dsa.desc: If a DSA procedure exists for a post, you can view case status (for example received, under review, decided) and follow up.

more.title: Open more actions
more.desc: This action opens the submenu with additional actions for the selected post or comment.

translate.title: Translate text
translate.desc: This action translates the message text into your configured app language.

flyTo.title: Jump on map
flyTo.desc: This action centers the app map directly on the message location.

navigate.title: Start navigation
navigate.desc: This action opens external navigation to the message location.

profile.title: Open message profile
profile.desc: This action opens the public message profile of the author for messages from other users.

report.title: Report content
report.desc: This action reports messages from other users through the DSA process if you suspect a violation.

close.title: Close / Back
close.desc: This action leaves the current level or closes the view.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and moderation
privacy.desc: Public text is checked server-side before publish/update by automated pattern detection (for example email, URL, UUID, phone numbers) and additionally by OpenAI moderation. Matches can lead to hiding or manual review. DSA reports create a case process with status tokens; only metadata required for moderation and legal processing is handled.

noteList.title: My private notes
noteList.intro: This screen manages your private notes for one location. You can open, edit, delete notes, and jump to their map position.

open.title: Open note
open.desc: Tap the note card content to open it in the edit dialog.

delete.title: Delete note
delete.desc: This action permanently removes the selected note.

edit.title: Edit note
edit.desc: This action opens the selected note for editing.

flyTo.title: Jump on map
flyTo.desc: This action centers the app map on the note location.

navigate.title: Start navigation
navigate.desc: This action opens external navigation to the note location.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the notes list.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

add.title: Create note
add.desc: This action creates a new private note for the current location.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Private notes are stored locally in IndexedDB and always stored in encrypted form. The note feature does not store note contents on the backend. When you start navigation, only start and destination position (as plus code/coordinates) are sent to Google Maps, not note text or media content. If you create a backup, notes are included in the encrypted backup file.

placeList.title: My places
placeList.intro: This view manages your saved places. You can open places, jump to map position, manage tiles, subscribe, and add new places.

open.title: Open place
open.desc: This action opens place settings for the selected place.

delete.title: Delete place
delete.desc: This action permanently removes the selected place from your list.

tiles.title: Open tiles
tiles.desc: This action opens the place tile view and manages related content.

flyTo.title: Jump on map
flyTo.desc: This action centers the app map on the selected place.

more.title: Open more actions
more.desc: This action opens the submenu with additional actions for the place.

edit.title: Edit place settings
edit.desc: This action edits the name, visual style, and additional place settings.

openMaps.title: Open in Google Maps
openMaps.desc: This action opens the place position in Google Maps.

subscribe.title: Subscribe place
subscribe.desc: This action enables notifications for the selected place.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe place
unsubscribe.desc: This action disables notifications for the selected place.

sort.title: Sort places
sort.desc: This action opens the sorting dialog and changes the order of your places.

add.title: Add new place
add.desc: This action creates a new place using the location picker.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the places list.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Place data is bound to your user account. Place names are stored encrypted on the server; position data is processed for map features. Opening in Google Maps transfers only location data to Google.

myPlaceSettings.title: My place settings
myPlaceSettings.intro: This dialog edits one place. You can change the place name, avatar, tile background, and transparency, then save your changes.

name.title: Edit place name
name.desc: This action changes the display name of the selected place.

avatar.title: Set or edit avatar
avatar.desc: This action sets a new place avatar image or replaces the current avatar.

avatarRemove.title: Remove avatar
avatarRemove.desc: This action removes the current place avatar.

background.title: Set or edit tile background
background.desc: This action sets or replaces the background image used for place tiles.

backgroundRemove.title: Remove tile background
backgroundRemove.desc: This action removes the current place tile background image.

transparency.title: Adjust background transparency
transparency.desc: This action changes the tile background transparency percentage.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without applying changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: This action saves and applies your place settings.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Place settings are linked to your account. Place names are stored encrypted, while location and style data are processed for map and tile features. Opening attribution links can send requests to external providers such as Unsplash.

myPlaceSort.title: Sort my places
myPlaceSort.intro: This dialog changes the order of your places.

reorder.title: Reorder places
reorder.desc: This action changes the place order using drag and drop.

settings.title: Open place settings
settings.desc: This action opens settings for the selected place directly from the sort list.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the sorting dialog without applying changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: This action saves and applies the new place order.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: The place order is stored with your place data. Only data required for sorting and display is processed.

tileList.title: Tiles
tileList.intro: This view shows the tiles for a place, contact, or experience. You can open tile content and switch to tile settings.

open.title: Open tile
open.desc: This action opens a tile content directly from the list.

settings.title: Open tile settings
settings.desc: This action switches to tile settings to edit order, visibility, and custom tiles.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the tile overview.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: The tile overview only displays data stored for the selected context. Opening external content can trigger requests to third-party providers.

tileSettings.title: Tile settings
tileSettings.intro: In this dialog you configure which tiles are shown, in which order they appear, and which custom tiles are available.

add.title: Add tile
add.desc: This action opens the menu of tile types and adds a new tile.

reorder.title: Reorder tiles
reorder.desc: This action moves tiles by drag and drop.

edit.title: Edit tile
edit.desc: This action opens the editor for the selected tile.

delete.title: Delete tile
delete.desc: This action removes an editable custom tile.

toggle.title: Toggle visibility
toggle.desc: This action shows or hides tiles without deleting them.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without applying changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: This action saves your tile configuration.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Tile settings are stored locally in the app and stored in encrypted form. They are included in backups.

tileEditAnniversary.title: Anniversary tile
tileEditAnniversary.intro: This dialog edits the anniversary tile with icon, title, and date.

icon.title: Select icon
icon.desc: This action sets the icon of the tile.

title.title: Edit title
title.desc: This action sets the display name of the tile.

date.title: Set date
date.desc: This action picks the anniversary date using the calendar.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Anniversary tile settings are stored locally and stored in encrypted form.

tileEditFile.title: File tile
tileEditFile.intro: This dialog manages files inside a tile, including order and file actions.

icon.title: Select icon
icon.desc: This action sets the icon of the tile.

title.title: Edit title
title.desc: This action sets the display name of the tile.

addFiles.title: Add files
addFiles.desc: This action adds new files to the tile.

reorder.title: Reorder files
reorder.desc: This action changes file order using drag and drop.

open.title: Open file
open.desc: This action opens a file from the tile.

remove.title: Remove file
remove.desc: This action removes a file from the tile.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Tile file metadata is stored locally and in encrypted form. Opening a file uses the browser or device app handler.

tileEditMigraine.title: Migraine tile
tileEditMigraine.intro: This dialog configures warning and alert thresholds for temperature and air pressure.

icon.title: Select icon
icon.desc: This action sets the icon of the tile.

title.title: Edit title
title.desc: This action sets the display name of the tile.

temperature.title: Set temperature thresholds
temperature.desc: This action defines warning and alert levels for temperature.

pressure.title: Set pressure thresholds
pressure.desc: This action defines warning and alert levels for air pressure.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Migraine threshold settings are stored locally and in encrypted form.

tileEditMultitext.title: Multi-text tile
tileEditMultitext.intro: This dialog edits a multi-line text tile with icon, title, and content.

icon.title: Select icon
icon.desc: This action sets the icon of the tile.

title.title: Edit title
title.desc: This action sets the display name of the tile.

text.title: Edit text
text.desc: This action edits the multi-line tile content.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Text contents of this tile are stored locally and in encrypted form.

tileEditPollution.title: Pollution tile
tileEditPollution.intro: This dialog defines which air-quality values are shown in the pollution tile.

displaySettings.title: Open display settings
displaySettings.desc: This action opens the dialog for tile icon and title.

keys.title: Select values
keys.desc: This action enables or disables individual measurement values.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: The selected pollution values are stored locally and in encrypted form.

tileDisplaySettings.title: Tile display settings
tileDisplaySettings.intro: This dialog lets you define the tile icon and title.

icon.title: Select icon
icon.desc: This action sets the icon of the tile.

title.title: Edit title
title.desc: This action sets the display name of the tile.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

tileEditQuickActionAction.title: Quick action
tileEditQuickActionAction.intro: This dialog edits one action inside a quick-actions tile.

icon.title: Select icon
icon.desc: This action sets the icon for the action.

label.title: Set label
label.desc: This action edits the action label.

type.title: Choose action type
type.desc: This action selects which type of action should be executed.

target.title: Set target
target.desc: This action defines the action target, for example URL, phone number, or address.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Action data is stored locally and in encrypted form. Running an action can call external targets depending on its type.

tileEditQuickAction.title: Quick action tile
tileEditQuickAction.intro: This dialog manages a tile with multiple quick actions.

icon.title: Select icon
icon.desc: This action sets the icon of the tile.

title.title: Edit title
title.desc: This action sets the display name of the tile.

addAction.title: Add action
addAction.desc: This action creates a new quick action.

reorder.title: Reorder actions
reorder.desc: This action changes action order using drag and drop.

editAction.title: Edit action
editAction.desc: This action opens the editor for an existing action.

deleteAction.title: Delete action
deleteAction.desc: This action removes an action from the tile.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Quick actions are stored locally and in encrypted form. Executing actions can open external services or apps.

tileEditText.title: Text tile
tileEditText.intro: This dialog edits a single-line text tile.

icon.title: Select icon
icon.desc: This action sets the icon of the tile.

title.title: Edit title
title.desc: This action sets the display name of the tile.

text.title: Edit text
text.desc: This action edits the tile content.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Text content of this tile is stored locally and in encrypted form.

tileEditTodo.title: To-do tile
tileEditTodo.intro: This dialog manages tasks inside a to-do tile.

icon.title: Select icon
icon.desc: This action sets the icon of the tile.

title.title: Edit title
title.desc: This action sets the display name of the tile.

addTodo.title: Add task
addTodo.desc: This action adds a new task to the list.

reorder.title: Reorder tasks
reorder.desc: This action changes task order using drag and drop.

toggleDone.title: Toggle done status
toggleDone.desc: This action marks tasks as done or open.

deleteTodo.title: Delete task
deleteTodo.desc: This action removes a task from the list.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without saving.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Task contents are stored locally and in encrypted form.

avatarCropper.title: Crop avatar
avatarCropper.intro: This screen lets you adjust the visible area of your profile image before applying it.

crop.title: Set crop area
crop.desc: Drag and scale the selection frame to choose the part of the image you want to use as avatar.

abort.title: Cancel
abort.desc: Closes the dialog without applying the cropped image.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: Applies the current crop as your new profile avatar.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Cropping and compression run locally in the browser. The result is stored only in your profile; sharing happens only if you explicitly share your profile with contacts.

locationPicker.title: Location picker
locationPicker.intro: This dialog searches places globally and sets the position that should be saved with your note or message.

search.title: Search place
search.desc: This action searches by place name or address.

select.title: Select position
select.desc: This action selects a search result or a point clicked directly on the map.

locate.title: Detect my position
locate.desc: This action uses your current position when location access is allowed.

view.title: Switch map and list view
view.desc: This action switches between map view and results list.

navigate.title: Open external navigation
navigate.desc: This action starts external navigation to the selected place from the results list.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without applying the new position.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: This action applies the currently selected position.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Search requests are sent to the Nominatim search service through the backend. Location data is only stored in your content after you apply it. External navigation sends only the selected destination address or coordinates to the map provider.

nominatimSearch.title: Search places
nominatimSearch.intro: In this dialog you search places via Nominatim and open results in list or map view.

query.title: Enter search term
query.desc: Enter an address, place name, or POI and start the search.

viewMap.title: Open map view
viewMap.desc: Use the map icon to switch to map view for the search results.

viewList.title: Open list view
viewList.desc: Use the list icon to switch back to the result list.

actions.title: Use result actions
actions.desc: For each result, you can jump to the place on the map or open external navigation.

add.title: Use as place
add.desc: When available, you can save a result as one of your own places.

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes place search.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Search requests are sent to the Nominatim service. External navigation sends location data to the selected map provider.

myContactShareQr.title: Share QR code
myContactShareQr.intro: This dialog shows your connect ID as a QR code so another person can scan it.

show.title: Show QR code
show.desc: This action displays the current connect ID as a QR code.

scanByOther.title: Let another person scan
scanByOther.desc: This action allows another person to scan your QR code and connect with you.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the QR code dialog.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: The QR code contains your connect ID. Share it only with people you want to connect with.

myContactScanQr.title: Scan QR code
myContactScanQr.intro: This dialog scans a QR code to connect with another contact.

camera.title: Allow camera access
camera.desc: This action requires camera permission so QR codes can be recognized.

scan.title: Scan and connect
scan.desc: This action reads a QR code and uses the scanned connect ID to start the contact connection.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the scanner without connecting.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: The scanned QR content is used to establish a contact link. Camera data is processed locally for scanning.

searchSettings.title: Search settings
searchSettings.intro: Here you define which search sources appear on the map and from which zoom level they are loaded.

sources.title: Show or hide sources
sources.desc: You can enable or disable each data source. Some private sources are only available with backend login.

zoom.title: Minimum zoom per source
zoom.desc: Defines from which map zoom level pins of that source are shown.

preview.title: Map preview
preview.desc: The preview shows immediately how your selected zoom values affect visibility.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: Closes the dialog without applying changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and storage
privacy.desc: Search settings are stored locally in app storage (IndexedDB). They only control how data sources are shown and loaded.

experienceSearch.title: Experience search
experienceSearch.intro: In this dialog you search experiences, filter results, and open details, bookmarks, or provider pages.

query.title: Start search
query.desc: Enter a search term and start searching. On later pages, the same button loads more results.

filter.title: Set filters
filter.desc: Use the filter menu to set date range, price, duration, and currency.

sort.title: Choose sorting
sort.desc: Set result order (for example relevance or price).

viewMap.title: Open map view
viewMap.desc: Use the map icon to switch to map view and tap pins to open matching results.

viewList.title: Open list view
viewList.desc: Use the list icon to switch back to the result list.

loadMore.title: Load more results
loadMore.desc: When available, search can load additional result pages.

details.title: Open details
details.desc: Opens the detail dialog with description, meeting points, map, and supplier information.

saveOrShare.title: Bookmark or send to chat
saveOrShare.desc: Depending on context, you can save an experience as a bookmark or send it directly to chat.

provider.title: Open on Viator
provider.desc: Opens the selected experience offer page on the provider site.

close.title: Close
close.desc: Closes experience search.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Search and detail requests are sent to the experience provider. External provider or map links follow their own privacy policies.

rangeEditDialog.title: Range editor
rangeEditDialog.intro: In this dialog you can enter precise minimum and maximum values for a range.

fields.title: Enter minimum and maximum
fields.desc: Type lower and upper bounds directly with the keyboard.

validation.title: Validation hint
validation.desc: If minimum is greater than maximum, an error hint appears in the subtitle and apply stays disabled.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: Closes the dialog without applying values.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

reset.title: Reset range
reset.desc: Resets the range to the full allowed limits.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Values are processed locally in the app. No external service is called.

valueEditDialog.title: Value editor
valueEditDialog.intro: This dialog lets you adjust one numeric value precisely.

field.title: Enter value directly
field.desc: Type the value directly with the keyboard. The allowed bounds are shown in the field label.

step.title: Adjust with plus and minus
step.desc: Use - and + to decrease or increase the value in the configured step size.

close.title: Cancel
close.desc: Closes the dialog without applying the new value.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

reset.title: Reset value
reset.desc: Resets the value back to the initial value used when opening the dialog.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: The value is processed locally in the app. No external service is called.

myExperienceList.title: My experiences
myExperienceList.intro: This view shows the experiences you saved from experience search. You can open details, jump to map positions, open tiles, and continue in external maps or on Viator.

details.title: Open details
details.desc: This action opens the selected experience in the detail dialog.

remove.title: Remove bookmark
remove.desc: This action removes the selected experience from your saved list.

flyTo.title: Jump on map
flyTo.desc: This action centers the app map on the destination of the selected experience.

tiles.title: Open tiles
tiles.desc: This action opens the tile list for the selected experience.

openMaps.title: Open in Google Maps
openMaps.desc: This action opens external maps for the selected destination.

openProvider.title: Open on Viator
openProvider.desc: This action opens the selected experience page on Viator.

sort.title: Sort experiences
sort.desc: This action opens the sorting dialog and changes the order of your saved experiences.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the dialog.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Saved experiences are linked to your account and loaded through the backend. Opening Google Maps sends destination coordinates to Google. Opening Viator sends a request to Viator and may process usage data there.

myExperienceSort.title: Sort my experiences
myExperienceSort.intro: This dialog changes the order of your saved experiences.

reorder.title: Reorder experiences
reorder.desc: This action changes the order using drag and drop.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the sorting dialog without applying changes.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: This action saves and applies the new order.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: The order of your saved experiences is stored locally in app storage. Only data required for sorting and display is processed.

importMultimedia.title: Import media
importMultimedia.intro: This dialog lets you insert external content by URL, for example from YouTube, Spotify, TikTok, or Pinterest.

url.title: Enter URL
url.desc: This action enters a media URL. The app validates the address automatically.

paste.title: Paste from clipboard
paste.desc: This action inserts a URL directly from your clipboard.

preview.title: Check preview
preview.desc: This action shows a preview of the embedded content before you apply it.

external.title: Enable external content
external.desc: This action opens external content settings if a platform is currently disabled.

clear.title: Clear input
clear.desc: This action removes the current URL and preview.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without applying content.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

apply.title: Apply
apply.desc: This action applies validated content to the previous dialog.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Checking and displaying external content sends requests to third-party providers. The app stores only selected media reference data; your own note or message text is not sent to these platforms by this step.

tenorSearch.title: GIF search
tenorSearch.intro: This dialog lets you search GIFs via Tenor and apply a selected result to your note or message.

search.title: Search GIFs
search.desc: This action searches by term or loads featured GIFs when no term is entered.

select.title: Select GIF
select.desc: This action applies one result directly to the previous dialog.

more.title: Load more results
more.desc: This action loads additional results for the current search.

enable.title: Enable external content
enable.desc: This action allows Tenor content display when external content is currently disabled.

close.title: Close
close.desc: This action closes the dialog without selecting a GIF.

help.title: Help
help.desc: This action opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: GIF search sends requests to Tenor/Google. The app stores only reference data for the GIF you select (for example URL, source, title); private note or message text is not sent to Tenor by this step.

hashtagSearch.title: Hashtag search
hashtagSearch.intro: Search by one hashtag and open matching entries from public and local sources.

scope.title: Choose scope
scope.desc: Switch between all, local only, or public only results.

search.title: Start search
search.desc: Use the search action to run or refresh the hashtag query.

result.title: Open result
result.desc: Tap a result row to open the related message, place, contact, or experience list.

help.title: Help
help.desc: Opens this help view.

privacy.title: Privacy and processing
privacy.desc: Public hashtag search requests are sent to the backend only for public messages/comments. Local results are searched entirely on-device in app storage.
